def_cn: （尤指英国学校的）级长（协助管理低年级学生的高年级学生）
def_en: In some schools, especially in Britain, a prefect is an older pupil who does special duties and helps the teachers to control the younger pupils.

def_cn: 地方行政长官；地方政府部门领导
def_en: In some countries, a prefect is the head of the local government administration or of a local government department.
